author: Nancy Davis
programme: The Hairy Bikers: Mums Know Best
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4. Place the bread in a food processor and pulse to make breadcrumbs. Mix the breadcrumbs with the remaining ingredients in a large bowl until the mixture pulls away from the sides of the bowl and forms a ball.  Form the mixture into a loaf shape and place in an ovenproof dish or loaf tin. Bake in the oven for 50–60 minutes, or until a skewer inserted into the centre comes out clean.
ingredients: 2 slices white bread,  1kg/2lb 4oz beef mince,  1 large red onion, chopped,  3 tbsp tomato ketchup,  1 free-range egg,  2 tbsp brown sauce,  1 tsp Worcestershire sauce,  70g/2½oz parmesan cheese, grated,  1 tbsp chopped fresh oregano,  1 tbsp chopped fresh parsley,  1 tbsp milk,  sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
